snippet: House investigators will receive a list of Fed staff employees who were the subjects of the Fed’s internal inquiry in 2012, when the leak took place.
abstract: Federal Reserve says Justice Dept is conducting criminal probe into 2012 leak of information about critical meeting of Fed committee that sets monetary policy; Fed will give House investigators list of staff members who were subjects of internal inquiry.
lead_paragraph: House investigators will receive a list of Fed staff employees who were the subjects of the Fed’s internal inquiry in 2012, when the leak took place.

headline.main: Justice Department Conducting Criminal Investigation of Leak at Federal Reserve
headline.print_headline: Fed Confirms Justice Department Is Conducting Criminal Investigation of Leak
